name: Mechamon! (Pokemon but you can only have one...))
name_original: Mechamon! (Pokemon but you can only have one...))
description:
Wanna catch 'em all?...Too bad! This game is all about making your starter the best it can be. You can only have one mech at a time. Every time you swap mechs, your stats reset to level 1! Choose between the red-starter (who packs a punch), the green-starter (who can take a hit), or the blue-starter (who is quite quick).  

Fight against opponents in arena style combat. You win by draining the opponent's battery to zero, then getting one final blow! But, be careful. Each attack you use drains your battery.  Thankfully, you can recharge by getting successful hits. 

Every time you win, you gain extra power.   Beat the training dummy until your stats bend the fabric of the universe!

Controls: WASD > Move

                       E > Interact

                      L-Click > Basic attack

                      R-Click > Launch weapon (hold to aim, release to fire)

P.S. Thank you for trying my game! I wanted to compose music and add a more complicated battle (along with a million other things) but I, unfortunately, ran out of time . I hope to flesh this game out in the future after I finish my current, long-term project. Let me know if you have any ideas!

Thanks!

Yak
